    Description

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CreateProfileActivity
    CreateProfileActivity handles the creation and updating of the user's profile information.
    GeneralSettingsActivity
    GeneralSettingsActivity handles the user's general settings including daily activity, target goals, meal numbers, and security settings.
    UserTimesActivity
    UserTimesActivity manages the user's meal times, displaying them in a RecyclerView.
